parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.80

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set [[velocity]] (speed vector) of a vehicle.   Units are in metres per second.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicleName [[setVelocity]] [x, y, z]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [x, y, z]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_truck1 [[setVelocity]] [20, 0, 0];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Advanced method used for relative acceleration:
<code>_vel = [[velocity]] _vehicle;
_dir = [[direction]] _vehicle;
_speed = 10; [[comment]] "Added speed";
_vehicle [[setVelocity]] [
	(_vel [[select]] 0) + ([[sin]] _dir * _speed), 
	(_vel [[select]] 1) + ([[cos]] _dir * _speed), 
	(_vel [[select]] 2)
];
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[velocity]], [[velocityModelSpace]], [[setVelocityModelSpace]], [[setVelocityTransformation]], [[speed]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on 20 Jun, 2014 - 16:50</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]</dt>
<dd class="note"><template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.22</value></part></template> [[setVelocity]] will be affected by [[setDir]] and [[setVectorDirAndUp]], so use it after them.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
